text.0: at dawn let agni muchbeloved guest of the house be glorified.
text.1: immortal who delights in all oblations brought by mortal men.
text.2: for dvita who receives through wealth of native strength maimed offerings.
text.3: thy praiser even gains at once the somadrops immortal gods.
text.4: nobles with song i call that car of yours that shines with lengthened life.
text.5: for god who givest steeds that car hither and thither goes unharmed.
text.6: they who have varied ways of thought who guard the lauds within their lips.
text.7: and strew the grass before the light have decked themselves with high renown.
text.8: immortal agni give the chiefs heroes who institute the rite.
text.9: heroes illustrious lofty fame who at the synod met for praise presented me with fifty steeds.
